item.title: Axios Framework
item.author: angelo05rettob@gmail.com (Angelo Anthony Rettob)
item.description: The Axios framework makes use of SFML. The Axios framework is used for 2D game development. It was actually meant to be a game engine, but I have no experience making a GUI yet. I believe that you should not do two major new subjects at the same time, so a framework it is.
